Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Temporarily \Tem"po*ra*ri*ly\, adv. In a temporary manner; for a time. [1913 Webster]

temporarily adv : for a limited time only; not permanently; "he will work here temporarily"; "he was brought out of retirement temporarily"; "a power failure temporarily darkened the town" [ant: {permanently}]
